rules_text: Search your library for an enchantment card and reveal it. If you reveal a Saga card this way, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand. Then shuffle. Make a statement. [i](Put a lore counter on a Saga you control or surveil 1.)[/i]
